channel.title: The Collector (Neutral Investigative)
channel.description:
[quote] <big>[color=A4A4A4]**The Collector**[/color]</big> [color=A4A4A4]**Neutral Investigative**[/color]
**Selling Information (Passive)** - If you are attacked at night, you will give the attacker the last result you got from a player that still alive and stop the attack. This passive can only happen once.
**Match (Day)** - Challenge a player to a rock-paper-scissor game tonight and occupy them. You cannot target a player two nights in a row. [Infinity Use] - [color=F7FE2E]**Win**[/color] - You will get their exact class and will not be affected by **Frame** or **Mindwarped** - **Draw** - You will know if they are [color=A4A4A4]**Neutral**[/color] or not. This including [color=A4A4A4]**Neutral Killer**[/color]. - [color=FE2E2E]**Lose**[/color] - You will get nothing.
**Mind Reading (Night)** - Guarantee to win **Match** tonight. Only usable from N4. [1 Use]
**Win condition:** *-[color=F7FE2E]**Win**[/color] or **Draw** 3 times.* [/quote]
*P/s: -Hey just come back after a month without Internet :expressionless:. Feeling so good to making ideas again. -Yea this idea may got affected by [color=FFFF00]**Pirate**[/color] from ToS lul.*

item.title: The Collector (Neutral Investigative)
item.dc:creator: SweetyCake
item.description:
The Collector
Neutral Investigative

Selling Information (Passive) - If you are attacked at night, you will give the attacker the last result you got from a player that still alive and stop the attack. This passive can only happen once.

Match (Day) - Challenge a player to a rock-paper-scissor game tonight and occupy them. You cannot target a player two nights in a row. [Infinity Use]

  • Win - You will get their exact class and will not be affected by Frame or Mindwarped
  • Draw - You will know if they are Neutral or not. This including Neutral Killer.
  • Lose - You will get nothing.

Mind Reading (Night) - Guarantee to win Match tonight. Only usable from N4. [1 Use]

Win condition:
-Win or Draw 3 times.

P/s: -Hey just come back after a month without Internet . Feeling so good to making ideas again.
-Yea this idea may got affected by Pirate from ToS lul.

Read full topic
